skills: Java/J2EE, XML, PLSQL, Sun Certified Java Programmer 1.6, Agile development, Object Oriented Methodology, Design Patterns, Web Services, Spring 3, jQuery, Bootstrap, JPA, Struts, Core Java, JSP, EJB, Designing, Coding, Unit Testing, Eclipse 4, Confluence UML, Git, Rally, Hibernate, Subversion, MySQL Server, JBOSS, PMD, Findbugs, Rhapsody, UDS Database, SQL express, Niagara AX, Oracle 11i, Weblogic 10, Axis, Requirement gathering, Bug Fixing
summary: Having 8.5 years of IT experience as Software developer in Java/J2EE Technologies, currently a Technical Designer at Tata Consultancy Services. Possesses Sun Certified Java Programmer 1.6, solid experience in Agile development, thorough understanding of Object Oriented Methodology and Design Patterns, and proficiency in developing web-based applications using Java/J2EE and WebServices. Also has exposure to Automation domain on Building Solution and seeks career growth in a fair working environment.
work_experience: The candidate has 8.5 years of IT experience, primarily as a Software Engineer and Technical Designer. From October 2006 to January 2010, as a Software Engineer, they developed the iCon3 tool for building management systems, focusing on automation to reduce labor, optimize cost, and manage system configuration, while also participating in analysis, design, and integration with JBOSS. From January 2010 to January 2011, as a Software Engineer on the FedEx Office project, they developed Struts code for printing and shipping services, performed bug fixing, and contributed to analysis and design for enhancement features. Since February 2011, they have worked as a Software Engineer and is currently a Technical Designer, involved in asset management and investment operations solutions for SEI, where they contributed to analysis and design for enhancement features.
